title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Deck Saloon", ca. 1934–35
description: Plan and elevations of deck saloon on Lady Esther Yacht. Double-door entrance on west wall at center. Capehart radio-phonograph on north wall in upper left corner; record storage in cabinet. Bar and open work table (?) to right of Capehart. Long five-seat sofa at right along north wall; armrests between each seat with built-in ash receiver. Long, narrow bookshelf with rounded end along east wall; tubular pole at end to connect open shelves. Door on east wall at lower corner. Staircase at center of south wall; wood balustrade with lighting in top and three tubular metal rails. Love seat to left of staircase with lighting behind sofa. Windows throughout room have horizontal venetian blinds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Deck Saloon", ca. 1934–35.
ca. 1934–35. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-423.
